content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Alternative Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Used for smelting iron ore into iron plates to support resource upgrades.
Consists of:
– Furnace (Position(x=5.0, y=5.0))

### Copper Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Used for smelting copper ore into copper plates to later enable copper cable production.
Consists of:
– Furnace (Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0))

ERROR TIPS
──────────
– API Parameter Usage Errors
 • When calling get_entities, avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or providing an incorrect number of positional parameters. Confirm the API’s expected signature before invoking.

– Lab Placement and Retrieval Failures
 • Ensure that a Lab is available in inventory before attempting placement at a target position.
 • When filtering retrieved lab entities, verify that the result is not None before iterating.

– Lab Crafting Ingredient Shortages
 • Multiple crafting errors indicate missing sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables). Prior to lab crafting, check that resource prerequisites are satisfied and that earlier smelting or production steps have successfully provided the needed intermediate items.
